string-array.name: get_organization_drives
string-array.item: Gets all of the drives in your tenant.

string-array.name: get_me_files
string-array.item: Gets the metadata list of children files under the root folder.

string-array.name: create_me_file
string-array.item: PUT: Create a file under root
Gets the metadata list of children files under the root folder.

string-array.name: download_me_file
string-array.item: GET: Download a file under root
Gets the contents of a file under the root folder.

string-array.name: update_me_file
string-array.item: PUT: Update the contents of a file under root
Gets the metadata list of children files under the root folder.

string-array.name: delete_me_file
string-array.item: DELETE: Delete a file under root
Gets the metadata list of children files under the root folder.

string-array.name: rename_me_file
string-array.item: PATCH: Rename a file in the root
Renames a file under the root folder.

string-array.name: create_me_folder
string-array.item: POST: Create a folder under root
Creates a folder under the root folder.
